Firestrike answered quickly.  "Destroy and take prisoners.  If there 
is no consent, destroy everything. Copy."  Firestrikes rhino body 
slid through te the dirt his torso twisting and contorting to the 
direction he wish ed to go.  A large dust cloud rose up and a 
second later a rhino burst fourth in a new direction.  Towards the 
shuttle.
